summary.body: Barely 2 hours after having placed in Andrewes 42 -59 a notice of the next EC2Gayz gathering  (on the 27th) we were shocked to discover it had been torn down. Is this a really enthusiastic member who doesn't want to miss the date, or could it be that we have a 'disgusted' in our midst? :roll: :
summary.subject: Homophobia in the Barbican?

summary.body: Not the furry kind but the shop variety. I finally had the excuse to go into the lovely shop Fox by Moorgate and London Wall and it was worth the wait. Although I couldn't find everything I needed the service was brilliant and I've now got matching belt and shoes... gorgeous! If ever you find yourself with an excuse (& cash) or just curious I can certainly recommend it. Stark contrast to my encounter in Ede and Ravenscroft (Cambridge branch) last week when buying clothes for my Civil Ceremony. Having gone through the whole measuring and trying bit for 1/2 hour, the shop assistant (boring dry personality) asked what the suit was for. When I told him, it was just like the scene of the conservative lady in Little Britian, I thought he was going to ask to wash his hands! Needlessly to say I just left.
summary.subject: Fox
